metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7178 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: CSRF was discovered in the web UI in Deluge before 1.3.14. The exploitationmethodology involves (1) hosting a crafted plugin that executes anarbitrary program from its __init__.py file and (2) causing the victim todownload, install, and enable this plugin.

criterions.comment: deluge: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
